text: 8|44|niṅṅaḷ kaṇṭumuṭṭiya sandarbhattil niṅṅaḷuṭe dr̥ṣṭiyil niṅṅaḷkk avare avan kuṟacc mātramāyi kāṇikkukayuṁ, avaruṭe dr̥ṣṭiyil niṅṅaḷe eṇṇaṁ kuṟacc kāṇikkukayuṁ ceyta sandarbhaṁ ōrkkuka. naṭakkēṇṭatāya oru kāryaṁ allāhu nirvahikkuvān vēṇṭiyatre at‌. allāhuviṅkalēkkāṇ kāryaṅṅaḷ maṭakkappeṭunnat‌
